testcase.name: add should return 10 when adding 6 and 4
add should return -5 when adding 0 and -5
add should return 0 when adding 0 and 0
add should return 20 when adding 10 and 10
isNumberEven should return true for an even number

testcase.name: isNumberEven should return false for an odd number
